values:
Haven't logged onto this in properly in so long.  Is it always so slow?  So much to say, but I never say it any longer.  Probably a good thing.  Sometimes though it does help seeing thoughts on paper so to speak, but I don't have the energy LOL

Roll on beach time!

Can't believe I have a 3 1/2 year old.  Time flies :(  He's amazing.  Funniest little guy ever!

Been at this job over 2 1/2 years now.  Still love it most days.  I wouldn't be human if I didn't have days when I could scream.  People are fantastic, and I've learned more here than ever before.

No, none of that is what is on my mind LOL

Hope everyone is ok ...
